description: This table stores the medication dispense pharmacy information.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: PHARM_REF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the pharmacy reference identifier.

columns.name: PHARM_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the pharmacy name.

columns.name: PHARM_PHONE_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the pharmacy phone number.
